name: v1.1.0
body:
See commit history for list of bug fixes and features since v1.0.0

## What's Changed
* Updated link to NLCD 2016, modified unzipping and content removal by @jmichellehu in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/11
* Fix datatype error due to shorthand + in apply_z_shift function by @ShashankBice in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/13
* Draft Beginner help document by @ShashankBice in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/14
* Update for beginners_doc by @meghanasharp in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/20
* get_rgi.sh - switch to OGR Merge and and set -e  by @elischwat in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/21
* Update dem_mask.py by @friedrichknuth in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/25
* Update dem_mask.py to parse file base name by @friedrichknuth in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/26
* add kwargs to difference maps by @ShashankBice in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/34
* Fix NCLD endpoint by @friedrichknuth in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/36
* Functions for applying Across-track(row-wise) and Along-track(col-wise) corrections to difference maps and source DEM by @ShashankBice in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/33

## New Contributors
* @jmichellehu made their first contribution in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/11
* @meghanasharp made their first contribution in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/20
* @elischwat made their first contribution in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/21
* @friedrichknuth made their first contribution in https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/pull/25

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/dshean/demcoreg/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0
